description: This source file implements the basic container object functions for the Ansc Daemon Socket UDP Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It defines functions for managing the lifecycle and internal state of the socket object, such as AnscDkuoCreate, AnscDkuoRemove, AnscDkuoEnrollObjects, and AnscDkuoInitialize.

classes.name: ANSC_DAEMON_SOCKET_UDP_OBJECT
classes.description: The core object representing the UDP daemon socket with members for states, configuration, and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscDkuoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs a new instance of the Ansc Daemon Socket UDP Object, initializing its base attributes and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDkuoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the UDP socket object, closing the socket and freeing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDkuoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls any subordinate objects required by the UDP socket object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDkuoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the UDP socket object, setting default values for internal members and preparing for operation.
